snippet: Peterson, a star running back for the Minnesota Vikings, has been charged in a child abuse inquiry in Montgomery County, Tex., involving his son.
abstract: NFL is rocked once more after arrest warrant is issued for Adrian Peterson, running back for Minnesota Vikings, who has been charged in child abuse investigation in Texas; charges claim that player abused his son while disciplining him with a switch, or a small tree branch; Peterson, through a lawyer, quickly sought to play down his behavior, saying he had engaged only in stern parenting.

byline.original: By STEVE EDER and PAT BORZI

lead_paragraph: Peterson, a star running back for the Minnesota Vikings, has been charged in a child abuse inquiry in Montgomery County, Tex., involving his son.

headline.main: N.F.L. Rocked Again as Adrian Peterson Faces a Child Abuse Charge
headline.print_headline: League Rocked Again as Star Faces a Child Abuse Charge
